# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the style transfer model.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a style transfer model

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the style transfer model that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the style transfer model shown in a playground.
